Recital.definition: a formal statement or setting forth of some relevant matter of fact in a deed or other document [a of a factual reason for a transaction] NOTE
Recital.origin: [a of a factual reason for a transaction]

1.1: a formal statement or setting forth of some relevant matter of fact in a deed or other document [a of a factual reason for a transaction]
1.note: A recital is often preceded bywhereas.
